# set up -----------------------------

library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")

# library(devtools)
# remotes::install_github("catalystcalifornia/rdaCharts") 
library(rdaCharts)
library(stringr)
library(gt)
library(htmltools)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(gtExtras)

#connect to postgres

source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")

con <- connect_to_db("eci_fresno_ripa")

# pull analysis table for visualizing


df<-dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM report_traffic_reason_race")%>%
mutate(race_label = case_when(
    race == 'latinx' ~ "Latinx", 
    race =='nh_white' ~ 'White',
    race =='nh_black' ~ 'Black',
    race == 'nh_asian' ~ 'Asian',
   race == 'nh_multiracial' ~ 'Multiracial',
    race == 'aian_aoic' ~ 'AIAN',
    race == 'nh_aian' ~ 'AIAN NH',
    race == 'nhpi_aoic' ~ 'NHPI',
   race == 'nh_nhpi' ~ 'NHPI NH',
    race == 'sswana_aoic' ~ 'SWANA/SA', 
   race == 'nh_sswana' ~ 'SWANA/SA NH', 
    TRUE ~ as.character(race)))%>%
  mutate(statute_literal_25 = case_when(
    statute_literal_25 == 'UNSAFE SPEED:PREVAIL COND' ~ "Unsafe Speed while Driving Vehicle", 
    statute_literal_25 =='NO REG:VEH/TRAILER/ETC' ~ 'No Vehicle Registration',
    statute_literal_25 =='OPR VEH:WINDOW OBSTRUCTED' ~ 'Obstructed Window',
    statute_literal_25 == 'FAIL STOP LINE/ETC AT RED' ~ 'Failure to Stop at Red Light',
        # statute_literal_25 == 'USE CELLPH W/DRIV W/O HFD' ~ "Using Cellphone While Driving Without Handheld", 
        #     statute_literal_25 == 'NO HND HLD DEVICE W/DRIVE' ~ "Using Cellphone While Driving Without Handheld", 


    TRUE ~ as.character(statute_literal_25)))


# split separate dfs for each denominator option-----

df_race<-df%>%
  filter(denom=="traffic_stop_race" &
            count >= 10) # I think this denominator is the best one for visualizing

# Combine the two 'using cell phone with no handheld device' citations into one -----

summed <- df_race %>%
  select(race, denom, statute_literal_25, total, count, race_label)%>%
  filter(statute_literal_25 %in% c("USE CELLPH W/DRIV W/O HFD", "NO HND HLD DEVICE W/DRIVE"))%>%
  group_by(race, denom) %>%
  summarise(statute_literal_25= "Use of Cellphone with No Handheld Device (combined)",
            total=total,
            count = sum(count),
            rate=count/total*100,
            
            race_label=race_label)%>%
  slice(1)

# Append these summed rows to the original data frame
df_combined <- rbind(df_race, summed)

# rearrange df and remove the previous separate cell phone citations

df_combined<-df_combined%>%
  ungroup()%>%
  filter(!grepl("USE CELLPH W/DRIV W/O HFD|NO HND HLD DEVICE W/DRIVE", statute_literal_25))%>%
  arrange(race, -rate)



# visualize--------------------------

# create caption 

sourcenote<-"Catalyst California calculations based on City of Fresno's Police Stop Data (2022), catalystcalifornia.org, 2024. "

methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated stops made by officers in 2022."

racenote <- "Race/ethnicity: AIAN=American Indian or Alaska Native, NHPI=Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander, SWANA/SA=Southwest Asian (Middle Eastern) or North African, or South Asian."

caption_text <- paste("<br>", sourcenote, methodnote)

# create tooltip text

tooltip_text <- "Out of all the people Fresno PD stopped in traffic and perceived as <b>{point.race_label}</b>, <b>{point.rate:.1f}%</b> of those people were stopped for the reason of <b>{point.statute_literal_25}</b>, or a total of <b>{point.count:.1f}</b> people."


# run function

chart_race<-rdaStackedBar(
  df_combined,
  "race_label",
  "rate",
  "statute_literal_25",
  title = "Fresno PD Stops BIPOC People in Traffic for Reasons Not Related to Safety",
  subtitle = "Percent of officer-initiated traffic stops by stop reason and perceived race",
  tooltip_text = tooltip_text,
  caption = caption_text,
  export_data_label = list(pointFormat='{point.rate:.1f}%')
)
